article_title: Supporters And Opponents Of Obamacare Must Do A Better Job Of Discussing Trade-Offs

article_metadata.author: Capital Flows

og.description: By SAURABH JHA: An advantage of being a foreigner, or a recent immigrant to be precise, is that it allows one to view events with a certain detachment. To analyze without the burden of love, hate or indifference for the Kennedys, the Clintons or the Bushes. To observe with both eyes open, rather than one eye looking at the events and the other looking at a utopian destination. The most striking thing I’ve observed in the healthcare debate in the US is the absence of an honest discussion of trade-offs.
og.title: Supporters And Opponents Of Obamacare Must Do A Better Job Of Discussing Trade-Offs
